page.title: 05Gala Week in Salterton
page.content: The biggest event in the year in Budleigh Salterton is {Gala Week }held in the last week in May. Originally organised by the shopkeepers,the event is now run by the Budleigh Salterton{Lions Club} and in 1985 over 5000 pounds was raised for charities.Thirty five events were organised,for people of all ages,and the most popular events were the {Carnival Procession }and the {Family Fun Run}which raised over 1000 pounds. Throughout the year the 25 men in the {Lions Club}run other fund raising activities as do many other voluntary organisations in Budleigh Salterton.
